text: Keh dijiye kay kiya mein tumehn bataon? Kay iss say bhi ziyada bura ajar paaney wala Allah kay nazdeek kaun hai? Woh jiss per Allah Taalaa ney laanat ki aur uss per woh ghussa hua aur unn mein say baaz ko bandar aur sooar bana diya aur jinhon ney maboodaan-e-baatil ki parastish ki yehi log bad tar darjay walay hain aur yehi raah-e-raast say boht ziyada bhatakney walay hain
